description:
Will prom go off without a hitch? Or is the real trouble lying in wait once the lights go dark? Either way, all good things must come to an end…
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Sassou to, Hiratsuka Shizuka wa Mae o Aruku.
Shizuka Hiratsuka fait vaillamment un pas en avant.
颯爽と, 平塚静は前を歩く.
